name: pix-e2e
description: Permet d'ex√©cuter des tests de bout en bout sur la plateforme Pix
author: GIP Pix

scripts.cy:open: NODE_ENV=cypress npm run db:initialize && NODE_ENV=cypress cypress open
scripts.cy:run: NODE_ENV=cypress npm run db:initialize && NODE_ENV=cypress cypress run --browser=chrome && exit
scripts.cy:test: NODE_ENV=cypress run-p start:api start:mon-pix start:orga start:certif cy:run
scripts.cy:test:open: NODE_ENV=cypress run-p start:api start:mon-pix start:orga start:certif cy:open
scripts.db:initialize: cd ../../api && NODE_ENV=cypress npm run db:delete && NODE_ENV=cypress npm run db:create && NODE_ENV=cypress npm run db:migrate
